info.title: Field Design Package Drawings and Documents Gathering API
info.description: API for gathering document like inspection drawings, engineering drawings, and vendordrawings for an field design package with pending documents

post.summary: Gather document from the line no. for the specified package
post.description: Send facility engineer for the provided package ID a plaintext URL that they can use to upload their pending documents. Also, return the tracking ID and status in plaintext.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the open field design package

200.description: Collects Field Design Package Drawings and Documents related to the line no. through a pending documents upload URL

documentUploadUrl.description: URL for the line no. to upload their pending documents

documentUploadTrackingId.description: Unique ID to track the status of the pending documents upload
